text: visvasiccavare, bahudaiva visvasikal avisud'dharan. atinal ‎ikkeallattinusesam avar masjidul haramine samipikkarut. ‎daridyram vannekkumenn ninnal bhayappetunnuvenkil ariyuka: allahu ‎icchikkunnuvenkil tanre anugrahattal ninnalkkma avan samrd'dhi ‎varuttum. allahu ellam ariyunnavanum yuktimanuman. ‎
